name: Karyl キャル / Princess Connect! Re:Dive
description:
weight 0.7 is best.

I created this LoRA as requested.

Please read the description. (6 outfits)


outfit1 (blue sleeves are removable)
karylaa, two-tone hair, low twintails, green eyes, fang, cat tail, sleeveless shirt, bare shoulders, blue sleeves, jewelry, purple skirt, black thighhighs



outfit2 (eyewear on head, purple jacket, white shorts are removable)
karylbb, two-tone hair, low twintails, green eyes, fang, cat tail, eyewear on head, collarbone, purple jacket, bare shoulders, swimsuit, black bikini, white shorts


outfit3
karylcc, two-tone hair, single hair bun, drill hair, hair flower, green eyes, fang, cat tail, black kimono, japanese clothes, floral print, sleeves past wrists, frilled sleeves, obi


outfit4
karyldd, two-tone hair, low twintails, white veil, hairband, green eyes, fang, cat tail, white ribbon, (white dress:1.1), white sleeves, navel cutout


outfit5
karylee, two-tone hair, low twintails, blue veil, hairband, green eyes, fang, collarbone, bare shoulders, black dress, black sleeves, thighhighs


outfit6
karylff, two-tone hair, hair ornament, hairclip, purple eyes, fang, collarbone, green jacket, open clothes, long sleeves, white shirt, clothes writing, bottomless

I uploaded a sample image of the outfit as a post.
